scripts.start: sass --watch ./views/styles:./public/stylesheets & nodemon -e pug,js,html,css,scss --watch public --watch bin --watch routes --watch views bin/www.js & mongod
scripts.go: sass --watch ./views/styles:./public/stylesheets & nodemon -e pug,js,html,css,scss --watch public --watch bin --watch routes --watch views bin/www.js
